page.title: 16LEISURE GREENHALGH/ROSEACRE
page.content: Leisure activities of a family of four, consisting of father, mother and two boys, aged 9 and 11. Father plays squash twice a week at a club outside the area. His main hobby is computer activities, for example programming, household accounts and some games. He also carries out most household and car maintenance. Both parents enjoy gardening. Mother enjoys sewing, making her own and boys' clothes. She is an active member of local WI and goes to Scottish Dancing outside the area. The boys belong to scouts and cubs which are outside the area. They also leave the area for football, cricket and swimming. Family outings are usually to fell country eg, pennines or Lake District, for walking, or cycling in the local area which is very flat.
